ticket.title: [patch] schema path in postgresql is broken
ticket.original-body:
How to reproduce: * Create a DB with multiple schemas. * create tables/views/... in multiple schemas * configure rails to know some schemas in config/database.yml * run rake db:test:prepare
What happens: * unpatched rails calls pg_dump with the wrong options -> fail * unpatched rails adds insert statements for the schem_migrations table without resetting the schema search_path in the dumpfile
